title: Sangria Blanco
directions: Mix lemon slices, grapefruit slices and juice, vermouth, Suze, pisco, and mint in a large pitcher or bowl and chill at least 4 hours. Add Vinho Verde to citrus mixture just before serving. Serve over ice.
Do ahead: Citrus mixture can be made 12 hours ahead. Keep chilled.
ingredients: 1 375-ml bottle Dolin blanc or dry vermouth
